name: Zombie Crusher Kill to Survive
description:
Come on the ground of zombies with their team zombie, moving all around everywhere, like a half dead human like creatures. They are to kill down and make you the remaining humans same as them. But worry not, here in this City Monster Truck Zombie Crusher: Kill To Survive game, we have come up with the best alternative solution to kill the zombies rather than sitting in a corner, with no vehicle to travel in case any zombie approaches you and you have no other option to die, if no one else rescues you in need. This fantastic top game offers a new idea to use for free in the ground of battle among human heavy trucks and zombies, and that is to drive a heavy truck car and move along in this truck simulator 3D game, and kill the zombies on ground.

Ride in your crusher truck and kill down the zombies live in the zombie dodge dead zombie adventure club. This is the time for free call mobile in truck simulator game and ready to throw the dead zombies in the far away island. Truck simulator train crash is waiting for its rider to enter the seat, and on the road rushing zombies are waiting to snatch out eat down its driver. In the truck zombies see their meal, but on the road you have to assume them as your target to kill shot them down for an extra point scoring. Get ready, fasten your seat belts, load your bullets in your heavy machine gun, this is not at all an ordinary war against the terrorists like the commando and sniper games you have been playing to cut down criminals and terrorists, but in fact this is the battlefield, warship duty against zombies, the half alive, half dead creatures.

City Monster Truck Zombie Crusher: Kill To Survive has easy and intuitive controls, score more points by shooting right in their head and getting them on ground in a short time, they are the real beast that are causing infection to humans in milliseconds, with their dangerous vampire like long poisonous teeth’s. Become the champion of this grand city zombie game with your simulator 3D truck and they make a mark by cleaning the city from un-wanted creatures. You are an expert trucker, this is the time to ride in the monster truck, roam around roads, with your weapons and assassins loaded in this heavy large wheel truck. In this infinite world of dead, the dead is your target and eradicate them all around the world, through their dead aches in an un-known island, where they can never get back to your world of peace, to destroy the calmness here. Aim and shoot for extra scores.

City Monster Truck Zombie Crusher: Kill To Survive has following amazing features:

Thrilling, destructive and demolishing gameplay
Realistic driving controls
Various unique missions of zombie road kill
Well featured speedway with horror theme
Excellent 3D graphics and visuals
FREE to install and play
Truck riding in city environment

Start your game now for an endless war against zombies. Do not be late or they can cover up everything in their dead bodies. Hurry for the fury!
